ComicInfo.Title: Issue 3
ComicInfo.Summary:
An all-new Highlander mini-series event spanning the ages as Connor MacLeod searches for the lost sword of his mentor, Ramirez!
Featuring another stunning script from Fathom writer JT Krul and incredible art from penciller Carlos Rafael and colorist Carlos Lopez, this mini-series is both a must for Highlander fans, as well as open and accessible to new readers! Plus, flashbacks to the Kurgan and Ramirez battling for the very first time!
Features connecting covers by Jean Diaz!
